short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NOTE: This extension is not afilliated with nor does it necessarily reflect the views of Walmart, inc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the lives of Walmart Associates by replacing the word "God" with "Sam Walton" and "OMG" with "OMSW" (Oh My Sam Walton) everywhere on the web!
